tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** **** ************ ** ***** ******* ***** Gone through a smooth pregnancy journey with her guidance. Both the c section & post delivery experience are fantastic. Friendly & easy going person. Thankfully she is available here in kolkata.  Highly recommended !!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
She is really awesome and I would recommend everyone in South Kolkata to refer her. 
Very cooperative, calm and explains things beautifully.
She doesn't recommend a single Test extra and I completed my complete Pregnancy with only 2 USG. Wonderful Doctor.

I have not seen a doctor with so much patience and she always has a smiling face.She is so polite and a wonderful person.She has so much of confidence that at once u r drawn to her.I have been her patient for many months now *** *** ***** *** ** ** ******** *** **** ************* * **** **** ***I feel most comfortable of her and i feel im safe in her hands.I wud reccommend her to everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Starting from pregnancy, during delivery and even after delivery, Dr. Sanyal has given tremendous support, continuous guidance, motivation and superb confidence in bringing our child in this world safe and healthy. Along with her in-depth expertise and knowledge, her kind and helping nature always made me and my wife feel that we are in safe hands. She listens to us patiently and never gets tired in answering to any of our questions (be a bland one or a serious one :))

I must recommend to visit her if you really need proper guidance and help in your maternity/paternity journey.

Thank You, Doc once again.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Overall good experience, she explained all problem in detail. I am. Happy with treatment. Girls should visit for pcod treatment.

*** ** *** **** **** ******* * **** **** I am under her treatment since 4 yrs. She stabilised my PCOS problem with minimal medicine. Currently I am pregnant.She never gives too much medicine or tests. Very patient, friendly. 
The best thing about her is if anyone has any doubt or emergency, then, she is available in whats app and phone. She will surely response with a solution. 

Will recommend to all patients.
